title: EC61415: Advanced Semiconductor Devices - Quick Facts
text:
EC61415
Course name | Advanced Semiconductor Devices
Offered by | Electronics & Electrical Communication Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: EC21007Electronic properties and technologies: SiGe and Group III-V compound semiconductors; Advanced HBT Devices: SiGe, GaAs, InP, GaN; Advanced Field Effect Devices: Heterostructure Field Effect Transistors (HFETs), Modulation Doped Field Effect Transistors (MODFETs), High Electron Mobility Transistors (HEMTs); Resonant Tunneling Devices (RTDs); Single Electron Transistors (SETs); Strained layer supperlattices and quantum well devices; RF and digital applications; Noise Characteristics; HBT Modelling; Heterojunction device simulation
